data.comment: Today's referee, Benoit Millot, has blown to start the match.
Benoit Millot signals a Montpellier throw-in in Brestois's half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Montpellier.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 4, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Brestois.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benoit Millot awards Brestois a goal kick.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Brestois in the half of Montpellier.
Brestois to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
In the minute 9, Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier's Florent Mollet gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Brestois needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 12, Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the Brestois defence as Andy Delort fires in a strike for Montpellier.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Can Brestois capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Brestois get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 28, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daniel Congre for Montpellier who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick Montpellier.
In the minute 29, Montpellierâ€™s Daniel Congre is on his feet again at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 32, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In Brest, Irvin Cardona of Brestois is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Brestois's Haris Belkebla breaks free at Stade Francis-Le Ble. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 33, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Brestois are pushing forward but Romain Perraud's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Brest.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Brestois have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 38, Benoit Millot signals a throw-in for Brestois, close to Montpellier's area.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 40, Montpellier are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
Pedro Mendes for Montpellier gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Corner awarded to Brestois.
Brestois push upfield and Steve Mounie gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Montpellier defence.
In the minute 44, In Brest Montpellier attack through Andy Delort. The finish is off target, however.
Brestois have a goal kick.
Benoit Millot signals a Brestois throw-in in Montpellier's half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Brestois in Brest.
Benoit Millot awards Montpellier a goal kick.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Gautier Larsonneur returns to the field for Brestois after picking up a slight injury.
The first-half has come to a close in Brest.
In the minute 45, Goal! Montpellier have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Gaetan Laborde.
That's a fine assist from Andy Delort.
In the minute 45, Brendan Chardonnet for Brestois has been booked by Benoit Millot and receives a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gautier Larsonneur.
The second half has started at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Benoit Millot awards the home team a throw-in.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Brestois at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Free kick for Brestois in the half of Montpellier.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 50, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In Brest Montpellier drive forward through Florent Mollet. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Christophe Herelle (Brestois) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Brestois is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brestois awarded a free kick in their own half.
Steve Mounie (Brestois) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Montpellier defenders.
In the minute 54, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Brestois's Steve Mounie is on target but unsuccessful.
In Brest a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Brestois are coming forward and Romain Perraud gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Benoit Millot awards Montpellier a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
Throw-in for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 58, Goal! Brestois go level at 1-1 through Romain Philippoteaux in Brest.
Steve Mounie with an assist there.
In the minute 61, Montpellier needs to be cautious. Brestois have an attacking throw-in.
Brestois have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Brestois goal kick.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Brestois.
Montpellier drive upfield and Pedro Mendes gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Brestois defender.
In the minute 65, Brestois's Romain Philippoteaux misses with an attempt on goal.
Benoit Millot awards Montpellier a goal kick.
In the minute 65, Jordan Ferri is replacing Keagan Dolly for the away team.
Junior Sambia is on a sub for Arnaud Souquet for Montpellier.
Joris Chotard is booked for the away team.
In the minute 66, Irvin Cardona is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Brestois's Irvin Cardona looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Montpellier will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Brestois.
In the minute 68, Hiang`a Mbock (Brestois) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Brestois have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Free kick Montpellier.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Brestois close to the penalty box.
Oliver Dall'Oglio is making the team's first substitution at Stade Francis-Le Ble with Jean-Kevin Duverne replacing Ronael Pierre-Gabriel.
In the minute 71, Brestois make their second substitution with Franck Honorat replacing Romain Philippoteaux.
Brestois pushes forward through Brendan Chardonnet, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Brest.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Brestois.
Montpellier drive upfield at Stade Francis-Le Ble and Andy Delort hits the bar with a header.
Brestois drive forward but Irvin Cardona is judged offside.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Brestois.
Brendan Chardonnet puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Romain Faivre instrumental with a fine assist.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Benoit Millot.
In the minute 81, Goal! Andy Delort equalizes to bring the score to 2-2.
Great play from Junior Sambia to set up the goal.
In the minute 83, Mihailo Ristic is replacing Daniel Congre for Montpellier at Stade Francis-Le Ble.
The away team replace Nicolas Cozza with Stephy Mavididi.
Michel Der Zakarian (Montpellier) is making a fifth substitution, with Yun Il-Lok replacing Joris Chotard.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Montpellier.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Brestois in their own half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
In the minute 89, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Brestois make their third substitution with Gaetan Charbonnier replacing Romain Faivre.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Brestois's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Montpellier in Brest.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Brestois in their own half.
Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Irvin Cardona for Brestois gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
